semantic: Allows an application to read from external storage.
Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.
Allows an application to write the user's contacts data.
Allows applications to open network sockets.
Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.
Allows an application to create windows shown on top of all other apps.
Allows an application to access the phone's state, including the network, phone number, and in-call status.
Allows an application to read SMS messages stored on the device.
Allows an application to read the user's call log.
Allows an application to view information about network connections, such as which networks are connected.
Allows an application to send SMS messages.
Allows an application to add shortcuts in the Launcher.
Allows an application to change Wi-Fi connectivity state.
Allows an application to get information about the currently or recently running tasks.
Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks.
Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the dialer interface.
Allows an application to write SMS messages.
Allows an application to monitor incoming SMS messages, to record or perform processing based on them.
Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep the processor from sleeping or the screen from dimming.
Allows an application to access approximate location.
Allows an application to access precise location (using GPS or network location sources).
Allows an application to write to external storage.
Allows an application to receive the action when the system has finished booting.
Allows an application to access location in the background.
Allows an application to answer incoming phone calls.
Allows an application to manage the device's policies.
Allows an application to act as a notification listener, receiving updates on the notifications received on the device.
Allows an application to place privileged phone calls without user intervention.
Allows an application to change the state of network connectivity.
Allows an application to clear user data for all apps on the device.
Allows an application to delete cache files.
Allows low-level access to power management.
Allows an app to start a foreground service.
Allows an application to install packages.
Allows modification of the phone's state, such as turning on/off network services.
Allows querying any normal app installed on the device.
Allows an application to read the system's low-level log files.
Allows an application to read the user's phone number and related data.
Allows privileged access to the phone's state, such as network information and ongoing call status.
Allows an application to request the deletion of installed packages.
Allows an application to request installing packages.
Allows an application to control whether activities are finished as soon as they go to the background.
Allows an application to view permission usage statistics for other apps.
Allows an application to access subscribed web feeds.
Allows an application to use ICC (Integrated Circuit Card) authentication with a device identifier.
Allows an application to read or write the system's secure settings.
Allows an application to read the browser's history and bookmarks.
Allows an application to monitor and process outgoing calls.
Allows an application to enter multicast mode for Wi-Fi connections.
Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.
Allows the Oppo launcher to write system settings.
Allows an application to collect component usage statistics.
Allows an application to read the system's settings.
Allows the Android launcher to write system settings.
Allows an application to write the browser's history and bookmarks.
Allows access to the device's vibrator.
Broadcasts when the system has finished booting.
Allows applications to disable the keyguard if it is not secure.
Allows applications to connect to paired Bluetooth devices.
Allows an application to collect battery statistics.
Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.
Allows an application to modify the system's settings data.
Allows applications to discover and pair Bluetooth devices.
Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.
Allows an application to access the device's camera.
Allows an application to display system alert windows on top of other apps.
Allows an application to read the system's secure settings.
Allows applications to write the sync settings for all accounts.
Allows an application to receive a broadcast when the user is present after the screen is turned on.
Allows an application to act as an AccountAuthenticator for the AccountManager.
Allows an application to uninstall shortcuts in the Launcher.
